name: The Legend of King Ar'Thur (Deren)
description:
A game made by Benjamin Rose, Nicolas Vogelbusch, Deren Saylik & Matthias Voigt

The prophecy says of whom pulleth out the sword from the anvil  that same is rightwise king-born of England! 

As Arthur pulled out the notorious sword out of the marble stone, he thus became King of Britain, bringing peace to his realm.  But what if I tell you that there is more to the story than just that. That Arthur was not as noble as you might think!  That in fact, he was aided by evil demons to become the most powerful king!

Experience the true story of the Legend of King Arthur! Switch between the human world and the demon world and take a look behind the scenes of the original story of King Arthur!

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
